github.copilot.chat.instructions.name: Auto-Summary Protocol
github.copilot.chat.instructions.description: Every 10 interactions, ask for a summary and suggest starting fresh
github.copilot.chat.instructions.instruction: Track conversation length. After every 10 prompts, automatically provide a summary of what we've accomplished and suggest: 'Would you like me to summarize our progress and start a fresh chat to keep context manageable?'
